node.name: AonixADT Ada Development Toolkit for GNAT and ObjectADA
node.shortdescription:
AonixADT is a free, commercial quality plugin for Ada language development in Eclipse under Windows, Linux and Sparc Solaris. In addition to supporting standard Eclipse functionality and views, AonixADT also provides:

GNAT toolchain support
ObjectAda toolchain support
Ada Project Navigator
Ada 95 Colorizing Editor
Semantic, project-wide navigation of Ada objects
Syntactic and Semantic Code Assist
Build Automation
Pretty Printing
Ada Project Wizards
File, Package, Procedure, Function creation wizards.
Configurable Toolchains
Graphical Debugger supporting attaching to running processes
node.body:
AonixADT is a free, commercial quality plugin for Ada language development in Eclipse under Windows, Linux and Sparc Solaris. In addition to supporting standard Eclipse functionality and views, AonixADT also provides:

GNAT toolchain support
ObjectAda toolchain support
Ada Project Navigator
Ada 95 Colorizing Editor
Semantic, project-wide navigation of Ada objects
Syntactic and Semantic Code Assist
Build Automation
Pretty Printing
Ada Project Wizards
File, Package, Procedure, Function creation wizards.
Configurable Toolchains
Graphical Debugger supporting attaching to running processes
